input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System
String Value - Reconciliation id of the Configuration Item
String Value - Unique identifier of the work order.
String value: Name of the configuration item. To be added in description.

output.description: XML document - success status against work order id
XML document - status message against work order id

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <WorkOrder> <entry1-form-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">AST:ComputerSystem</xsl:text> </entry1-form-name> <entry1-request-id>${recon id}</entry1-request-id> <entry1-request-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Configuration Item</xsl:text> </entry1-request-type> <entry2-form-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">WOI:WorkOrder</xsl:text> </entry2-form-name> <entry2-association-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Related to</xsl:text> </entry2-association-type> <entry1-request-description>${name}</entry1-request-description> <entry2-request-id>${work order id}</entry2-request-id> </WorkOrder> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="concat("Unknown configuration name: ", .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> <work-order-id>${work order id}</work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Work_Order_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Work Order

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unknown system "${system}"</xsl:text> </status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will associate a CI to a Work Order with a "Relate to" type of association. Only CI's from BMC_ComputerSystem are supported. Only one CI can be related to one work order at a given time using this action.
